article: Growing old is something that nobody can understand until they experience it for themselves.I may not be "old" but I am certainly beginning to  _  it? turned 18 just over a week ago.I am now an adult. As a child you  _  adults--or "grown-ups" as I used to call them--to always be in control.to know what is right and wrong.  _  as a teenager, I thought that when I reached 18 I would be far more  _  in many aspects of life.But now that I am 18, 1 know that is not true. It is clear to me now that you do not  _  learning when you are 18.Every day you learn something  _  , no matter what your age.However, I do understand when you become an adultyou have to  take on  more responsibility. Whereas before I seldom had to clean the dishes, set the table or help out around the house, now I do all of those.I have already  _  myself the nickname "housekeeper". I can even drive now, which is pretty  _  , because of the frequency of accidents.But that's not to say that 18 is not  _  to be.Not only can I drink alcohol, but I can also  _  .In fact, being 18 has made me really interested in politics because it now means that I can change things on  _  Day.More and more of my friends want to become politicians, and it is great to think that they can change things for the better.
